title: [Lake, North Shore]
description: Vagrant breezes blowing across the lake to the west carry a cool touch of moisture that settles in a damp blanket across the meadow grass.  The edge of the meadow makes an abrupt drop to the shadowed water below, no gentle shoreline leading down to the water, only a granite ledge that drives back the lapping waves, narrowing the channel through which the water runs.

Vagrant breezes blowing across the lake carry a cool touch of moisture that settles on the meadow grass in tiny glistening jewels.  The edge of the meadow makes an abrupt drop to the water below, no gentle shoreline leading down to the water, only a granite ledge that drives back the lapping waves, narrowing the channel through which the water runs.
